prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon with sandy textures and a tough demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon resembling a small, tough lizard with a playful attitude.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sandy color palette that thrives in desert environments.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon that looks both intimidating and friendly at the same time.
Make a Pokemon that blends into its environment with earthy colors and strong features.
Design a Pokemon with a sturdy body and a mischievous smile that loves the sun.
Give me a creature that combines ruggedness with a playful spirit, perfect for desert adventures.
